summary: This is an email chain from December 2020 discussing the status of the Jeffrey Epstein estate's compliance with a subpoena for private video recordings made at his properties. The emails reference a news article about the estate being required to share these videos.

events.title: Email inquiry about estate compliance
events.description: An email was sent inquiring about the status of the Jeffrey Epstein estate's compliance with a subpoena for private video recordings from his properties.

events.title: Follow-up planned on estate video subpoena
events.description: A recipient states they will add the issue of the estate's compliance with the video subpoena to their list to follow up on in the New Year.

keyFacts: A subpoena was issued to the Jeffrey Epstein estate for private video recordings made at his properties.
As of December 2020, the status of the estate's compliance with this subpoena was unclear and required follow-up.
The correspondence references a news article from olcmagazine.com regarding the estate's obligation to share these videos.
